author: Jamal Harris
title: Department of Transportation skipped multiple steps in Kensington Expressway Project
text: Department of Transportation skipped multiple steps in Kensington Expressway Project The Kensington Expressway also known as the “33” is an admitted, massive, racial injustice mistake from nearly 70 years ago that has torn a hole right through the east side of Buffalo. The expressway is a key part in shaping the current economic and environmental disaster surrounding the East part of the city. The once beautiful Humboldt Parkway green space was completely torn away and replaced with a 6-lane highway, robbing East Side residents — predominantly residents of color — of greenspace. State and local politicians have acknowledged that and have agreed with the residents that the restoration of Humboldt Parkway needs to happen sooner rather than later. Plans were underway for the state to do just that with construction contracts being planned to be handed out sometime this month. However, the state threw the community for a loop as they instead opted to restore the parkway but keep the concept of a highspeed expressway. Plans to build a tunnel under the parkway were developed and confirmed resulting in multiple lawsuits from Eastside Parkway Coalition (ESP). ESP is an organization committed to the full restoration of Humboldt Parkway. They claim the State’s attempt to keep this highway would cause mass environmental harm and they have skipped multiple legal steps in ensuring the project was environmentally safe. ESP’s attorney Alan Bozer stated that the state failed to do an Environmental Impact Statement. WBFO has confirmed that the Department of Transportation (DOT) has not filed an Environmental Impact Statement and instead opted to do a 325-page Environmental Assessment. However, flaws were found in that report as the assessment does not cover any construction years, just the year of project completion 2027, and 20 years after completion 2047. The Department of Environmental Conservation released an air quality study showing a significant drop in air quality along the Kensington Expressway starting at Grider Street and going through Humboldt Parkway and downtown. The drop in air quality included many elevated focus spots for nitrogen dioxide and black carbon. Despite this information against the construction of the tunnel, state and local officials have ignored the calls to stop construction, instead doubling down. The Governor’s office reiterated their previous statement: “This is a once-in-a-generation opportunity to correct one of the most damaging planning injustices of the 20th Century, and we look forward to reconnecting this community soon.” The City of Buffalo's Acting Mayor Christopher Scanlon threw his support behind the state’s decision. “I think we have to be careful at times that thinking that what we hear from residents may be the majority of residents," said Scanlon. "So at this point, I’m ok with us moving forward with the project.” Opening arguments will be heard in court on Friday, October 25, at 2 PM.

organizations.name: Kensington Expressway Project Department of Transportation

author: 小浪财讯
title: 机器人ETF（562500）跌0.24%，半日成交额3.69亿元_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
6月19日，截止午间收盘， 机器人 ETF（562500）跌0.24%，报0.821元，成交额3.69亿元。机器人ETF（562500）重仓股方面， 汇川技术 截止午盘跌0.05%， 科大讯飞 跌0.55%， 石头科技 跌0.26%， 大华股份 跌1.03%， 中控技术 跌0.49%， 双环传动 涨1.20%， 大族激光 跌0.63%，机器人跌1.63%， 巨轮智能 跌1.36%， 拓邦股份 跌0.30%。
机器人ETF（562500）业绩比较基准为中证机器人指数收益率，管理人为华夏基金管理有限公司，基金经理为华龙，成立（2021-12-17）以来回报为-17.84%，近一个月回报为-5.80%。

author: VNExplorer
title: VIDEO Bernard de la Villardière victime d'agressions en série, il raconte : "j'ai dû interrompre le tournage..."
text:
Bernard de la Villardière a relaté, via son compte X – anciennement Twitter -, avoir été agressé à Roissy. Depuis le plateau des “Grandes Gueules” ce jeudi 25 avril 2024 sur RMC et RMC Story, il a dévoilé que c’était loin d’être un acte isolé. Le présentateur d'”Enquête exclusive” a raconté être régulièrement la cible d’agressions.
Bernard de la Villardière agressé : il raconte
Exclusif – Bernard de La Villardière – Vernissage de l’exposition
Bernard de la Villardière – Lancement du nouveau livre de Jean-Marie Périer
Bernard de La Villardière – 28ème cérémonie des Lauriers de l’Audiovisuel au théâtre Marigny à Paris le 20 février 2023. Elle sera diffusée en différé sur TV5 Monde, pour la deuxième année consécutive, le 22 février. © Coadic Guirec/Bestimage
Bernard de La Villardière et sa femme Anne – 28ème Gala de l’Espoir au profit de la Ligue contre le cancer au théâtre des Champs-Elysées à Paris le 29 Novembre 2022. © Philippe Baldini/ Bestimage
Bernard de La Villardière – Avant-première du film
Portrait de Bernard de la Villardiere, lors de l’enregistrement de l’émission
Exclusif – Bernard de La Villardière – Inauguration de la Fête à Neuneu au profit de l’association
Bernard de La Villardière et sa femme Anne au photocall du concert du gala des 20 ans de la fondation Recherche Alzheimer
Bernard de La Villardière – Arrivées à l’hommage funèbre à Jacques Perrin aux Invalides à Paris, France, le 29 avril 2022. © Christophe Clovis/Bestimage
Bernard de La Villardière – 29ème Gala de l’Espoir donné au profit de la recherche contre le cancer au théâtre des Champs-Elysées à Paris le 27 novembre 2023. © Coadic Guirec/Bestimage
Bernard de la Villardière – Marche pour la République et contre l’antisémitisme à Paris le 12 novembre 2023. © Denis Guignebourg / Bestimage
Bernard de La Villardière – Célébrités dans les tribunes des Internationaux de France de tennis de Roland Garros 2023 – Célébrités dans les tribunes des Internationaux de France de tennis de Roland Garros 2023 le 6 juin 2023.
Exclusif – Brigitte Fossey et Bernard de La Villardière – Remise du 27ème Prix François Chalais à la maison France télévision x Brut lors du 76ème Festival International du Film de Cannes, France le 26 Mai 2023
Exclusif – Patrick De Carolis, Bernard de La Villardière et Gérard Holtz – Remise du 27ème Prix François Chalais à la maison France télévision x Brut lors du 76ème Festival International du Film de Cannes, France le 26 Mai 2023
Portrait de Bernard de la Villardiere, lors de l’enregistrement de l’émission
Chaque dimanche en deuxième partie de soirée, Bernard de la Villardière présente Enquête exclusive sur M6. L’animateur, qui s’est confié sur son combat contre la maladie, a été l’invité des Grandes Gueules ce jeudi 25 avril 2024 sur RMC et RMC Story.
Depuis le plateau de l’émission où Charles Consigny a réglé ses comptes avec Bertrand Chameroy, il a été interrogé sur un message qu’il a posté sur X le mercredi 24 avril. “Retour d’Equateur, comité d’accueil à Roissy par des baltringues et des traînes-savates – faux taxis sans doute – qui me traitent d’islamophobe et de raciste. Un policier alerté ne peut rien faire bien-sûr. La prochaine, ce sera le coup de couteau ? Bienvenue en France !”, a-t-il écrit sur le réseau social autrefois appelé Twitter.
“ Je suis souvent agressé… ” : Bernard de la Villardière pris à partie par des faux taxis à Roissy
Olivier Truchot lui a demandé ce qu’il s’était précisément passé. “Il s’est passé ce qui se passe pour moi depuis quelques années. Chaque fois que j’arrive dans ce pays – je rentre chez moi après des voyages à l’autre bout du monde -, je suis souvent agressé à Roissy de manière verbale par des gens qui sont là, des faux taxis souvent. On se demande d’ailleurs ce qu’attend la société Roissy-Charles de Gaulle pour faire un peu le ménage…”, a répondu le présentateur de M6.
“Il y a une police anti-faux taxis, mais ils ne sont pas assez nombreux. Ils ne sont que quelques dizaines, d’ailleurs les vrais taxis s’en plaignent régulièrement… Et voilà je passe : ‘Ah oui La Villardière, islamophobe, raciste…’ Avant c’était quand je faisais 100 mètres, je les entendais vaguement derrière moi, et aujourd’hui, ils viennent face à moi pour m’insulter… Je ne l’admets pas ! J’ai l’impression que je prends plus de risques en France que dans d’autres pays où je vais depuis des années…”, a poursuivi l’animateur qui a fait de tristes révélations sur son état de santé.
Des incidents sur le tournage d’ Enquête exclusive
Bernard de la Villardière a ensuite relaté avoir été la cible de menaces lors de tournages pour Enquête exclusive. “Deux fois, j’ai dû interrompre le tournage parce qu’il y a des gens qui sont venus vers moi en me disant : ‘Monsieur de la Villardière, allez-vous en parce qu’au sinon on va vous égorger…’ Ça s’est passé à Saint-Brieuc, sur les quais de Saône à Lyon l’année dernière, et c’est un vrai scandale !”, a-t-il déploré.
“Pourquoi on vous traite d’islamophobe et raciste ?”, lui a alors demandé Olivier Truchot. “Je ne sais pas de quelle idéologie ça procède, mais en tout cas, je pense que c’est une volonté en France de conquérir le territoire, d’intimider tous ceux dont on estime qu’ils sont islamophobes parce qu’ils critiquent des régimes islamistes. Parce que je vais en Afghanistan, en Irak, que j’ai dénoncé les actions de Daesh en France et à l’étranger…”, a estimé Bernard de la Villardière.

author: efe
title: 1-6: ¡Proeza del Olympiacos de Mendilibar!
text: Dos goles en la prórroga del montenegrino Stevan Jovetic y el marroquí Youssef El-Arabi en la prórroga permitieron al Olympiacos, que dirige el vasco José Luis Mendilibar, sellar su pase a los cuartos de final de la Conference League, tras remontar los tres goles de desventaja (1-4) con los que cerró el choque de ida, al golear este jueves por 1-6 al Maccabi Tel Aviv. Pero si Jovetic, exjugador del Sevilla, y El Arabi, que militó cuatro temporadas en el Granada, fueron los encargados de culminar la remontada griega en el tiempo extra, el triunfo de los de Mendilibar no puede entenderse sin la sobresaliente actuación de Daniel Podence. El atacante portugués lideró la victoria de un Olympiacos que en poco o nada se pareció al del encuentro de ida, en el que los de Pireo perdían por un claro un claro 1-3 apenas cumplida la primera media hora de juego. Todo lo contrario de lo ocurrido este jueves en la ciudad serbia de Backa Topola, donde juega sus partidos europeos el conjunto israelí a causa del conflicto de Gaza, donde el equipo heleno apenas tardó diez minutos en dejar claro que iba a por la remontada. El tiempo que tardó en entrar en acción Podence, que anotó el 0-1 en una acción en la que el atacante luso logro generarse el espacio suficiente en el interior del área para batir (0-1) con un ajustado disparo al portero israelí Roi Mishpati. Pero Daniel Podence no sólo posee gol, sino también la visión de juego y la precisión en el golpeo para asistir a sus compañeros, como dejó claro con los dos sensacionales pases que permitieron a Konstantinos Fortounis y al marroquí Ayoub El Kaabi igualar la contienda (0-3) antes de llegar al descanso. Todo un varapalo para el Maccabi Tel Aviv, que tras lo ocurrido en la ida se veía ya en unos cuartos de final, que los del irlandés Robbie Keane parecieron a volver a tener en sus manos tras recortar distancias (1-3) con un gol de penalti de Eran Zahavi a los 57 minutos. Sin embargo, ni el Olympiacos, ni mucho menos El Kaabi estaban dispuestos a que nada, ni nadie les apartara de la siguiente ronda de la Conference League como demostró el atacante marroquía los 65 minutos con un espectacular gol (1-4) de chilena que llevó la eliminatoria a la prórroga. Tiempo extra en el que el conjunto heleno traslado su superioridad al marcador con los goles de Jovetic en el minuto 93 y El-Arabi, que diez minutos más tarde firmó el definitivo 1-6 para los de Mendilibar, que tras llevar el pasado año al Sevilla a la conquista de la Europa League quiere conquistar este curso con el Olympiacos la Conference.

author: Bo Dalton
title: Did You Know? A Condiment as Medicine! Thursday January 4, 2024 | KMAG 99.1 | Bo Dalton
text:
Today, we're diving into the surprisingly medicinal history of a household favorite – and no, it's not what you're thinking!
Picture this: the year is 1834. Medicine is not as advanced as it is today, and people are always on the lookout for new remedies. Enter a popular condiment, which, believe it or not, was once considered a medicinal miracle for indigestion. Yes, we're talking about ketchup!
Back in the 1830s, ketchup wasn't just the perfect companion for fries and burgers. It was actually prescribed and sold as a treatment for digestive woes. Hard to imagine, right? But it's true! This common kitchen staple was believed to have healing properties and was recommended by some doctors to their patients suffering from indigestion.
So, how did this transformation happen? The journey from medicine cabinet to dining table is as intriguing as it is amusing. Initially made with ingredients like tomatoes, spices, and vinegar, ketchup was thought to aid digestion – a theory that, while not entirely accurate by modern standards, was quite popular at the time.
As time went on and medical science advanced, ketchup gradually lost its medicinal status. Instead, it found a permanent spot in our kitchens and hearts as the beloved condiment we know today. It's fascinating how the perception and use of everyday items can change so drastically over time.
So next time you're enjoying your favorite ketchup-slathered dish, take a moment to appreciate its quirky and unexpected past. Who knew that a simple bottle of ketchup had such an interesting story?
Stay tuned for more surprising facts and stories in our "Did You Know?" series. Stay curious.
-Bo

author: straitstimes.com
title: In Nigeria and much of Africa, Catholic same-sex couples see no blessings soon | The Straits Times
text:
ABUJA - Nigerian Catholic couple Jane and Lucy have little hope their local parish church will bless their same-sex union anytime soon, as conservative priests across Africa choose to ignore a landmark Vatican ruling allowing such blessings.
Conservative Catholics have condemned the Vatican's declaration two weeks ago, which was approved by Pope Francis, that will allow blessings for same-sex couples, as long as they are not part of the regular Church rituals or liturgies.
The pope has hit back against the criticism and what he called inflexible ideological positions that hinder the Church from moving forward.
But in many African countries, such as the continent's most populous one, Nigeria, even having a same-sex relationship is outlawed and often punishable by long jail terms.
Little wonder that 39-year-old Jane, who has been living with her partner for six years, does not feel the Vatican's declaration will change much.
"Maybe in the next 20 years (or) next 30 years but right now it will be difficult for them (Bishops) to just accept this," Jane told Reuters inside her room in north central Benue state.
In the Anglican church, the issue has caused deep divisions for more than two decades, most recently following Archbishop of Canterbury Justin Welby's proposal earlier this year to allow priests to bless same-sex unions, bringing the faith close to splitting point.
The Catholic Church has so far sought to avoid the impression of conflict.
Catholic bishops from Angola, Kenya, Nigeria, Malawi to Sao Tome and Principe, Uganda and Zimbabwe are among clerics who have said they will not bless same-sex couples, but have argued that the Pope's decree can be interpreted as optional.
Father Patrick Alumunku of St Louis Catholic Church Mbora parish in the capital Abuja said the Vatican declaration was unsettling for many followers but should be viewed as a move towards inclusiveness for all God's children.
He denied that this was an incremental step to eventually accept same-sex unions in the church.
"There are laws that have been made by God and by the church in 2000 years which cannot change," said Alumunku.
For activist and poultry farmer Jane, the fact that the issue is being discussed openly is reason enough to consider eventually approaching her priest for a blessing, if her partner agrees.
"I think he (Pope Francis) tried to understand the feelings of people who tend to be born different or people who basically are now becoming like the outcasts of this society," she said.
"We are getting there, a moment of self expression and acceptance is coming." REUTERS
Join ST's Telegram channel and get the latest breaking news delivered to you.

author: John Aguilar
title: Neighborhood parks in Arvada, Denver receive more than $15 million in grant money for improvements
text:
Denver’s La Alma-Lincoln Park and Arvada’s Gold Strike Park together recently received $15.7 million in federal grant money, it was announced Thursday.
The Department of the Interior awarded the money from its Outdoor Recreation Legacy Partnership Grants Program, part of $254 million awarded to support 54 projects that support local parks in underserved communities across the United States. The Outdoor Recreation Legacy Partnership is part of the Land and Water Conservation Fund and is managed by the National Park Service.
Related Articles Colorado News | Denver closes two public parks citing drugs sales, violence and vandalism Colorado News | Denver’s La Alma Lincoln Park joins Five Points as the newest historic cultural district The $8.4 million bound for La Alma-Lincoln Park, which played a significant role in the history of Colorado’s Chicano movement, will be used to fund a new exercise and cultural story loop, skate park and playground expansion, new roller skate loop and plaza, picnic grove, pollinator garden, restored amphitheater, and sports court and field improvements.
The $7.3 million allocated to the Gold Strike Park in Arvada, the site of Colorado’s first gold discovery, will be used to build a nature playground, water-play area, bouldering feature, trails, creek crossings, pedestrian bridge, flexible event lawn, picnic area, pavilion and pollinator garden.
Get more Colorado news by signing up for our daily Your Morning Dozen email newsletter.

author: La 100
title: El yuyo que hay que ponerle al mate con propiedades antioxidantes
text:
La uña de gato es una planta trepadora con importantes propiedades curativas que, sin embargo, está en peligro de extinción. Su nombre científico es Uncaria tomentosa, y crece principalmente en las selvas tropicales del centro y sur de América, especialmente en la región amazónica.
Debe su nombre popular a las espinas curvas que emergen de sus tallos, parecidas a las garras de los felinos. Se trata de una planta de tallo leñoso y flexible que puede alcanzar hasta 30 metros de largo, con hojas ovaladas y aterciopeladas, flores tubulares blancas o amarillas, y frutos en forma de baya rojiza o anaranjada.
Propiedades medicinales de la uña de gato
Desde la época prehispánica, las culturas indígenas amazónicas ya utilizaban esta planta por sus efectos medicinales. En la actualidad, distintos estudios científicos respaldan sus beneficios, entre ellos:
- Antiinflamatorias: alivia dolor, inflamación y enrojecimiento.
- Inmunomoduladoras: refuerza la respuesta inmune, útil en tratamientos contra el cáncer.
- Antineoplásicas: contribuye a prevenir la formación de tumores.
- Antioxidantes: combate el envejecimiento celular y algunos tipos de cáncer.
El Instituto Nacional del Cáncer (NCI) de EE.UU. incluso señala que el extracto de uña de gato “puede inhibir la proliferación de ciertos tipos de células cancerosas”.
Además, fortalece el sistema inmunológico y es útil para tratar trastornos gastrointestinales como gastritis, úlceras y la enfermedad de Crohn. También se investiga su potencial antiviral y antibacteriano.
Mirá También: El yuyo que hay que ponerle al mate para desintoxicar el hígado después de grandes comidas
Cómo se consume este yuyo
Existen varias formas de consumir uña de gato para aprovechar sus propiedades:
- Infusión o té: se prepara con una cucharadita de la raíz o corteza seca en agua caliente, dejando reposar 10 a 15 minutos. Puede tomarse hasta tres veces al día.
- Suplementos: disponibles en cápsulas, tabletas o extractos líquidos en tiendas naturales. Se recomienda seguir las dosis indicadas y consultar al médico.
- Extracto líquido: se puede diluir en agua u otros líquidos siguiendo las indicaciones del envase.
Precauciones y contraindicaciones
A pesar de sus múltiples beneficios, la uña de gato puede tener efectos adversos si no se usa correctamente:
- Embarazo y lactancia: no se recomienda por falta de estudios suficientes.
- Enfermedades autoinmunes: puede agravar condiciones como lupus o artritis reumatoide.
- Pacientes trasplantados o con medicamentos inmunosupresores: podría interferir en los tratamientos.
- Alergias: puede causar reacciones como picazón, erupciones o dificultad para respirar.
- Interacciones con medicamentos: especialmente anticoagulantes, inmunosupresores o fármacos para la presión arterial.
Por eso, siempre es fundamental consultar con un profesional de la salud antes de comenzar a consumir cualquier planta medicinal, incluso si es de origen natural.
